title: 820-00244-A
message:
Hi guys.

I have this board with no power issue. It had a short on PPBUS_G3H specifically U7210 was burned and I replaced it, but also before that as i was following the short i took out U7000 and then resoldered it. Now the short in gone but it's stuck on 5v. I have all the LDO lines on U3100(CD3215A)... Any ideas?

Thanks  🖖

title: 820-00244-A
message: Also the voltage on the gate of Q3100 is higher then PPVBUS_LIO(the source) Bad U3100?

title: 820-00244-A
message: Dead CPU for sure; overvoltage went trough U7210.

title: 820-00244-A
message: I replaced U3100 and Q3100 still same so as you said CPU probably :D Thanks

title: 820-00244-A
message:
if overvoltage went through short u7210 most likely you will have shorted these pins on your burned ic.
[ATTACH type="full"]60161[/ATTACH]

That can be probably a quick check for a dead cpu :/

title: 820-00244-A
message: Yes it was a dead CPU. I notified client :D Thanks for the help guys
